Everyone has their own special light: Everyone has their own special light
About-Text:
Hello,
My name is Eden Gedj.
I've always loved crafting, creating art, and designing.
For me, jewelry holds a special place in my heart; it’s truly one of my greatest passions.
Jewelry has the power to highlight the unique light of the person wearing it.
It is much more than just an accessory or body decoration; it carries a story, energy, memories, and even family heritage.

That’s why jewelry excites me.
When I’m in my workshop, creating a new piece, I feel like I’m in another universe—where time doesn’t exist, and I’m fully immersed in a state of creative flow.
It’s a feeling that’s hard to put into words.

My inspiration comes mainly from nature itself.
Each piece is one of a kind, handmade with care, crafted from sterling silver or 14K gold.
In addition, I create custom-made jewelry tailored to individual wishes.

Enjoy the magic!
